name: The Tale Of Radley
description:
Welcome to the The Tale Of Radley

Play as a little ghost with a lantern across three stages. 

This game starts you off as a ghost named Radley (Custom Sprite and animation), you will encounter a new enemy (Bats) , and 4 pieces of music spread across the game. 

Watch out for what lies in the dark and be careful where you step. This game uses the unity 2d lighting system to create a spooky atmosphere along with lots of custom tiles and art.
